label: disgust

text: Falling over.
label: shame

text: When my last year's second semester results came through - I wasecstatic.
label: joy

text: I was sleeping in my room but woke in the middle of the night tothink I could hear noises and see shadows moving. I felt thatsomeone was in the house.
label: fear

text: I assisted to a scene where the police attacked a person thatdidn't have his documents. The savagery was too much, and theattacked person bleeded to much.
label: disgust

text: In a party of friends I got completely drunk.
label: shame

text: Once in my homes yard, I was plaing football with my cousin andin a certain quick the ball went on uncontrolled putting down abird-cage, killing it.
label: guilt

text: When I get something that seemed very hard like getting a job, aboyfriend, etc. A specific sutuations, was when I started to datea boy whom I liked for a long time.
label: joy

text: I felt very sad when I had to give up something that by right wasmine and although I didn't get it, a kind of suvenir that peopledon't give you the right to have.
label: sadness

text: The acts of brutal violence in generally disgusts me. Fights,phisical aggrssion, etc.
label: disgust

text: I felt ashamed when in a certain occasion I had to read a textand didn't stop stuttering.
label: shame

text: The loss of the woman who loved me most till today.
label: sadness

text: In a sexual experience with an unknown woman where after thesexual act I only could go away without looking backwards.
label: disgust

text: When I wanted to kiss a friend and didn't succeed, I felt shame.
label: shame

text: On a telephone talk where I was agressive and stupid without theleast, reason or better motive.
label: guilt

text: When I succeed in writing something I felt and doing it I feltwell and very happy for being able to express to myself somethingthat was suffocating me.
label: joy

text: When I crashed my car.
label: fear

text: When in a difficult moment I couldn't express myself correctlyand my thought came out with distortions bringing about highlynegative and distorted results.
label: anger

text: When I heard about the death of somebody I liked very much and Iwas not present either to see the person or to try to share myemotions with other friends.
label: sadness

text: When somebody suddenly said something (about me) at a wrongmoment and I didn't agree (at that exact moment I was needing anextremely positive word).
label: shame

text: When my mother surprised me while masturbating.
label: shame

text: After my final examination at school I was glad that theexamination was over and that I had passed it.
label: joy

text: I was angry with a person who behaved terribly at a balloffending her relatives.
label: anger

text: My brother caught a spider and let his frog eat it.
label: disgust

text: Once I spoke without thinking very much - it was quite anonsense.
label: shame

text: I was not sure whether I should help an old woman going down aflight of stairs. I just watched her and saw how difficult it wasfor her to do it.
label: guilt

text: For about one year I had a rather bad relation with my father.Last Christmas Eve he invited me to stay withhim and I was veryglad about it. It was a fine evening.
label: joy

text: I live outside Graz - so I have to go by bus. One day I went homefrom the bus stop alone. It was dark, I had to go through aforest and there was a dark figure behind me. I was veryfrightened.
label: fear

text: Several years ago my mother died. She had been ill for a longtime, but nevertheless her death came unexpectedly. I did not andI still do not want to believe that it is true.
label: sadness

text: I have a horror of spiders and snakes. On a walk through the woodI saw the body of a slow-worm (without the head).
label: disgust

text: I came home from a party rather drunk. I said things I wouldnever have said normally. Next morning I was terribly ashamedabout what I had said.
label: shame

text: An accident happened to my little cousin because I had not takenenough care of her. She fell on the floor and her hands werehurt.
label: guilt

text: I had a little cat which was very sick. As I liked it very much Iwent to a veterinary with it. He told me how to tend it and itreally recovered its health. Everybody said that I had saved itslife.
label: joy

text: When I was a child, I had a terrible nightmare with St. Nicholas'Devil Servant. I asked my mother if he really existed and shesaid yes. The following nights I could not sleep and alight had to be left turned on.
label: fear

text: As I usually do not start learning until a short time before anexamination,, I once made up my mind to try to work for a longertime. But once again I did not do it - and got a bad mark.
label: anger

text: A friend told me about his cousin who is my girlfriend. He saidshe had treated him in a mean and nasty way. I was surprisedbecause in front of other people she had always treated him in afriendly way. I am very sad about it.
label: sadness

text: I went out with my sister, her boyfriend and his friend. I didnot like this young man. But suddenly he overcame me and kissedme. He was very strong so that I could not defend myself.
label: disgust

text: During the oral part of my final examination I made a mistake inspeaking so that all the teachers laughed at me.
label: shame

text: There was a time when I did not get on well with my sister. Ialways grumbled at her and said bad things about her to mymother. So my mother always scolded her.
label: guilt

text: When I was on a cave excursion with friends, I suddenly lost themand was afraid of losing my way in the cave.
label: fear

text: When I felt being treated unjustly by a teacher.
label: anger

text: When my grandmother died; I had a stronger relation to her thanto my mother.
label: sadness

text: When I was molested by an old drunk man.
label: disgust

text: When I had drunk too much and nearly got an alcohol poisoning.
label: guilt

text: When my grandparents moved to another part of the town.
label: sadness

text: At the butcher's I saw an animal which had just been slaughtered;blood was dripping on the floor.
label: disgust

text: In school I was very bad in running long distances and myclass-mates laughed at me for this reason.
label: shame

text: I had to take care of my little brother. When I met a friend Idid not pay attention to him for a certain time and he was hurtwhile he was playing.
label: guilt

text: On my birthday, an old friend of mine sent me a card. I had notmet him for a year and I was very glad that he had thought of me.
label: joy

text: When we still attended school, my brother and I usually went tosee our aunt and to show her our term's report. She rewarded uswith money. Although my reports were as good as my brother's, hegot more money.
label: anger

text: My friend was pregnant, but lost her child during the secondmonth. I went to see her at hospital - she was crying. I feltvery sorry for her.
label: sadness

text: When I attended school, our class visited an institution formentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried tocontrol my feelings, I was disgusted.
label: disgust

text: After a party I spent the night with a friend. We both weredrunk, the morning was disillusioning. A friend was me leavingthe room and I felt shabby and immoral.
label: shame

text: A very good friend of mine had been away for three months. Whenwe met again, we ran up to each other and embraced.
label: joy

text: One evening my father told me to go into the cellar and get him abeer. I was terribly frightened at the idea of a man sitting inthe cellar and assaulting me. For my defence I took an emptybottle with me.
label: fear

text: I had stolen a bottle of rum from a person who knows me well. Hethreatened to call the police if I did not pay 500 Shillings.
label: anger

text: When my uncle died I saw a funeral for the first time. All peoplestood around the open grave and cried.
label: sadness

text: At a party I met a girl who drew me to her, told me some nonsenseand always wanted to kiss me.
label: disgust

text: I put my head into the pullover of a girl to see her breasts. Thegirl looked at me so that I felt ashamed.
label: shame

text: Several days after my final examination at school, I was sittingin an airplane on my way to Greece. I enjoyed that moment verymuch.
label: joy

text: One night I was lying in my bed awake but I had my eyes closed. Isaw figures with terrible faces and black frocks bending over meand touching me. I opened my eyes but I could still see them. Ihad the feeling that somebody was in the room. It was terrible.Only when I turned on the light I was able to go to sleep.
label: fear

text: I had arranged with a friend to go with him to Carinthia by car.We had arranged a place where to meet. I was a bit late and myfriend had left already. I had no money to go by train. I nearlystarted to cry because I was so angry - it was very important forme to go to Carinthia.
label: anger

text: Our dog had to be shot because he had killed a roe. I liked himvery much and so I could not resign myself to that. I hated thehunter who shot him.
label: sadness

text: I was sitting in a station-hall and watching a lavatoryattendant. She was very dirty. She started to eat something outof a dirty cup - it must have been something like lard. Then shetook some breadcrumbs out of the pockets of her apron and atethem. I had to leave - I felt like vomitting.
label: disgust

text: I had to go to the doctor's because of a veneral disease. I toldthe doctor that I must have been infected by my boy-friend. Thiswas not true, but I was ashamed to tell the truth.
label: shame

text: When we were playing, I hurt my little sister, but towards mymother I did not admit that it was my fault.
label: guilt

text: My neighbour was not able to set his car in motion because it hadsnowed heavily. I helped him - he was thankful and invited me.
label: joy

text: I was skiing with friends and they wanted to ski-jump. I did notwant to be left behind, so I braced myself and followed them.
label: fear

text: At an examination I got a bad mark just because of a smallmistake. When I went to the lector and wanted to talk about that,he did not listen to me but sent me away.
label: anger

text: My cut was run over by a car. After searching for a long time Ifound her lying in a kerb. I was rather shocked and angry withthe driver.
label: sadness

text: When I watched a report about El Salvador on TV, I saw people whohad been murdered by terrible methods.
label: disgust

text: At a cross-country race I wanted to take a short-cut (which isnot allowed). I was caught and disqualified. All my friends hadobserved that.
label: shame

text: During a discussion I reacted very aggressively and so I made itimpossible to continue discussing.
label: guilt

text: On my birthday I got a present that I had desired for a longtime.
label: joy

text: When I am discussing something with a person and I realize thatthe other person is thinking over her own argumentations insteadof listening, I become angry.
label: anger

text: When we were on holidays my girl-friend had to leave me after 4weeks and I had to stay in Turkey for some more weeks because Ihad a job there.
label: sadness

text: I studied medicine for several semesters. I was always disgustedwhen we had the dissecting-course. I cannot understand why somepersons like this course.
label: disgust

text: Some time ago we had a tournament in our tennis-club. Fortactical reasons I was chosen to play against a much weakerplayer than I am. Although it would have been enough simply towin the game, I defeated him extremely. This would not have beennecessary.
label: shame

text: I had a discussion with my girl-friend. After some time westarted to quarrel and at least - to get the upper hand - I saidthat she was not as important to me as she might believe. Sometime later I apologized for that.
label: guilt

text: On New Year's Eve I went in a disco with friends. I amused myselfand got to know many other people.
label: joy

text: I had to go to the dentist's. When he touched my tooth with hisdrill, I was terribly aftaid of the pain I would feel any moment.
label: fear

text: I was very hungry and just wanted to start eating when a friendcalled me who usually talks for a long time. I was angry becauseI was prevented from eating.
label: anger

text: My sister, whom I like very much, asked me for a favour which Irefused her for some flimsy reason. Some time later I felt sorryfor that and something like sadness.
label: sadness

text: I asked my friend to come with me to a disco because I wanted tobe with a person I know well. But when I amused myself withothers I let my friend sit alone, although I had asked her tocome.
label: shame

text: I had a singing-lesson, but I was not very good. The lastexercise was singing scales. I did that very well and my teacherseemed satisfied.
label: joy

text: A friend had promised to call me at a certain time. I expectedhis call impatiently but in vain.
label: anger

text: Years ago on Christmas Eve I felt very sad because I realized forthe first time how I missed my father who had died at ChristmasYears ago.
label: sadness

text: A man whom I like, was drunk and tried to molest me.
label: disgust

text: It was the time when everybody spoke about and discussedHainburg. I was also asked for my opinion. I was ashamed becauseI had no firm view of the whole thing and therefor was not ableto join the conversation.
label: shame

text: On my 18th birthday I passed the driving-test. I was glad becauseI had had to study very much, because I had been lucky andbecause - as a proof that it was really difficult - not everybodyhad passed the test.
label: joy

text: I had cared for a horse for 2 years. One day it was sold and Icried for several days because I was so sad.
label: sadness

text: A friend of mine was telling jokes which I felt to be verydisgusting, especially because I was eating.
label: disgust

text: By fun I had a tussle with my sister. Suddenly I obviously hurther unintentionally - and she ran out of the room, crying.
label: guilt

text: During my first week in Graz I met a girl who I had got to knowin the train from Amsterdam to Graz. Although I had consideredher very sympathetic, we had seperated without changing ouradresses.
label: joy

text: Many years ago I saw the film \Psycho\" by Hitchcock for the firsttime. When I saw the film I was alone and afterwards I hardlydared to go to bed and hardly was able to sleep."
label: fear

text: I was at home alone when I realized that a young roe approachedour house. I hid because I did not want to frighten it. Itlimped. Some time later, when I thought that it had already runaway, I saw it lying on our terrace. I came nearer and saw thatit was terribly wounded. I informed the ranger who said that theroe must have been attacked by dogs. He had to shoot it.
label: sadness

text: Several years ago I stayed with friends in the mountains for oneweek. We lived in a hut and had to cook for ourselves. One day myfriend did not succeed in preparing spaghetti. That dinner wasterrible - nevertheless we all ate rather much and had animproper and unsavoury conversation.
label: disgust

text: My mother and my grandmother were talking about one of mygrandmother's friends whom I hardly know. I gave some deprecatorycomments on him whereupon my grandmother told me that the man haddied recently.
label: shame

text: I had not studied very much for my final examination at school,so I had to take an additional examination in French. The oralexamination was not very hard for me - the more I was glad when Iheard that I had passed it.
label: joy

text: When I was 8 years old my tonsils had to be operated on. This isnot a complicated operation, but just before it started I wasvery afraid so that I will never forget it.
label: fear

text: My parents are divorced, father pays alimony for me. Two yearsago my sister who lives with father, suddenly asked mother formoney. As she considered the amount of money my mother offeredher too small, she brought an action against mother. I wasterribly angry with my sister.
label: anger

text: I arranged with a friend to go skating the next day. He asked meto wake him up by telephone at twelve o'clock because we had comehome late in the morning. Next day I called him - he was not athome. As something like that had happened to me several timesbefore, I came to the conclusion that one cannot rely on anybodyand I felt very sad.
label: sadness

text: Whenever I see a spider or a snake I feel disgusted.
label: disgust

text: When I had slept with a boy for the first time I felt ashamed forthree reasons. First, because I was only 13 years old, second,because I did not really like him, third, because he had caughtme napping.
label: shame

text: I had been together with my boy-friend for two and a half years,when he got to know another girl and not even tried to concealthat from me. I drew my conclusions and left him - I also felt abit guilty for what had happened.
label: guilt

text: My boy-friend told me that he would take me to the training ofthe life-saving dogs.
label: joy

text: I was in a dark cellar and saw a glowing red point. I thoughtthat it was a person with a cigarette - but it was only the redswitch.
label: fear

text: A man treated his dog very badly - he insulted and beated himuntil the dog kept lying on the floor with his tail drawn in.
label: anger

text: A horse which I had liked very much was taken away.
label: sadness

text: On TV I saw a report about church in Amerika. A priest was shownwho was performing miracles in front of the camera - I feltdisgusted.
label: disgust

text: When I was a child, my uncle came to see us. I spit at him andran out - I do not know the reason for that. My father came afterme and insisted on my apologizing.
label: shame

text: I quarreled with my boy-friend. He said it was unfair that Ialways started crying so that he had to give in.
label: guilt

text: To be able to prepare myself better for an important examination,I did not spend the nitht with my girl-friend but in thestudents' hostel. I had not done that for months. The day when Ihad the examn, somebody knocked at my door at seven o'clock inthe morning. My girl-friend who likes sleeping late, had come tobe able to be with me.
label: joy

text: My son's mother told me that she wanted to move to Vienna andtake the child with her. This means a rather long distance forme. My whole family was sad and dumbfounded so that my ownfeelings were intensified.
label: sadness

text: When a very near person got into an awkward situation but showedonly helplessness and indecision.
label: disgust

text: I spent an evening with my girl-friend. When we wanted to go tobed I was totally drunk. Next morning I felt rather ashamed.
label: shame

text: After a long time I saw my boy-friend again.
label: joy

text: My first public appearance in front of a rathe big audience.
label: fear

text: I was angry about how the government acted concerning Hainburg,especially when I saw a discussion about it on TV.
label: anger

text: Death of my father; he died of laryngeal cancer.
label: sadness

text: When I got indecent offers.
label: disgust

text: When I bought new skis; I was ashamed to tell the assistant thatI am not good at skiing and therefor bought racing skis.
label: shame

text: My schoolmates were teasing a pupil who was not able to defendhimself very well; I should have taken his part.
label: guilt

text: Before an examination: I had the fealing that I had not learnedenough.
label: fear

text: Once when I was playing table tennis I was already sure that Iwould win , but at last I lost the game.
label: anger

text: In cinema I saw a film which showed how a person was torn out hisguts when he was still alive.
label: disgust

text: I was sitting in a restaurant with friends. They asked mesomething which they thought I should know. Actually I know it,but at that time I was not able to remember it.
label: shame

text: I had an appointment with a friend. I promised him to meet withhim, but at last I did not without having informed him.
label: guilt

text: When I had a psychical crisis, I met a girl, who told me that shehad had almost the same problems and how she had finally overcomethem.
label: joy

text: I had climbed on a cherry tree alone and there was a thickcaterpillar beside my fingers. I feel disgusted by caterpillarsand snakes. I was terribly afraid of the caterpillar crawling onmy fingers. Out of the fear I was almost unable to climb down.
label: fear

text: A friend of mine told other people that I was a slattern (becauseof an occurence that had happened some time ago). When I heardabout that I was very angry.
label: anger

text: My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only a few days left tolive. I had always loved him, but never told him. When I saw himfor the last time, I had the feeling that I had omitted so manythings I could not do again. - There was a fly sitting on hisforehead and he was too weak to drive it away. I was very sadwhen I saw that.
label: sadness

text: Normally my father never tells vulgar jokes, we do not speakabout sexual things, too. But once he told such a vulgar joke,that I was really disgusted. He did not tell me, but some of hisfriends, but I was present.
label: disgust

text: When I was 6 or 7 years old, I pulled down the trousers of afriend because I wanted to know what she looked like. My motherwatched that and (as a punishment) sent me into the house. Wenever spoke about that; I think it was as embarassing for her asit was for me.
label: shame

text: When I told my boy-friend, who loved me very much, that I wantedto put an end to our relationship. a long time before I told himthat and also a long time after that I felt guilty, because I hadhurt him so much.
label: guilt

text: Unexpectedly I met some persons who I like very much.Spontaneously they invited me and integrated me within theirgroup, although it was late in the evening.
label: joy

text: After a footballmatch I went home by car, a friend drove. I didnot realize that he was drunk until we were in the car. He wasmadly racing. Several times we were in dangerous situations and Itold him to be cautious, but he did not care.
label: fear

text: A friend of mine uses butter instead of oil when he is cooking. Iam always angry about that, because it is an unnecessary luxury.Recently we both were cooking and he wanted to use butter again.When I had already put the oil into the pan, he poured it outagain and put the butter into the pan.
label: anger

text: After some friends had come to see me. They had stayed forseveral days and we had got on very well. When they had left, Ihad a feeling of emptyness.
label: sadness

text: I had a quarrel with a friend who lived with me in the same flat.He moved out. Before he went he invited me and some friends for adrink. At last he was totally drunk and smelled disgusting.Besides, he told lies about us and behaved as if he was to bepitied.
label: disgust

text: I went to see a friend. There were other people, too, andeverybody brought some present. I was the onlyone who broughtnothing. My friend was very hospitable and did not show anything- although I knew how he felt.
label: shame

text: With a group of handicapped people we went to a party. When wewanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. Ihad told his mother that we would leave at 4.30 p.m., actually itwas planned for 3.30 p.m. Therefore there was a delay.
label: guilt

text: I had a quarrel with my fiancT. When he admitted his fault,everything was allright. It was then for the first time that hesurprised me with coffee and cake and a bunch of flowers.
label: joy

text: After my boy-friend had beaten me for the first time, I alwaystrembled when somebody knocked on my door or when I heard stepscoming nearer.
label: fear

text: I had not eaten anything for 2 days to be able to pay the finefor my fiancT. But he stayed in another town and spent onethousand shillings in the restaurant during the same time.
label: anger

text: I was insulted without a reason by a drunk man.
label: disgust

text: I spied on my fiancT and was terribly jealous. Later I saw thatthere was no reason for that.
label: guilt

text: My sister had a daughter. I saw the baby for the first timethrough a pane of glass and she looked at me.
label: joy

text: My mother, my sister and I were sitting in the sitting room andwatching a film on TV. My father came home drunk and told us toturn off. When we did not do that he switched off the fuse andstarted shouting. We were sitting in the dark and I was afraidthat he would do us a harm.
label: fear

text: I bought an aquarium which made me much pleasure. I was watchingthe fish when my father came in and asked me how much I had payedfor it. He said he would not pay for the current that it wouldrequire.
label: anger

text: When I was 9 years old, I got a cat, but after 3 days he died. Iwas very sad, because I had nursed him and taken him to theveterinary's - but in vain. Although I had had him only for ashort time I had liked him very much.
label: sadness

text: When my grandmother was about 80 years old, she lived with us forseveral years. I saw her illness. I did not even want to breaththe air that smelled of her presence.
label: disgust

text: When I was 17, I had a mystic vision. I melted into a dazzlinglight, which omitted perfect love. The physical experience becameunimportant, I heard or saw the words \overcome egotism\". Thefeeling of joy remained for month after that experience."
label: joy

text: When we had swimming instruction, we had to take a header fromthe springboard. I usually refused to do that, but at least I wasforced to.
label: fear

text: When I played in a chess championship, I was disturbed by otherpeople. I asked them to be quiet, but in vain.
label: anger

text: When my flute-teacher was replaced by a new one.
label: sadness

text: When I was a child, I was sometimes forced to eat things thatdisgusted me.
label: disgust

text: When I was 12 years old, some friends of our family had come towatch TV. I lay on the floor and moved my pelvis. When the otherpeople had gone, my mother told me that it had looked as if I hadwanted to make sex.
label: shame

text: I lived in a flat with a couple. The woman was so jealous of me,that she sometimes had crying fits. Eventually her husband couldnot stand that any more and wanted to kill me.
label: fear

text: I have a very big family. At my grandmother's funeral we all metand everybody pretended mourning. In reality it was like afashion-show: everybody wanted to show himself.
label: anger

text: Often a dog which is treated very badly by his owner comes to us.
label: sadness

text: After a pleasant evening with friends in my flat, one of them didnot want to leave, because he wanted to sleep with me. He saidthat he had fallen in love with me, that he felt alone and so on.
label: disgust

text: When I heard that I had passed my final examination at school(with success).
label: joy

text: Before my final examination.
label: fear

text: When my mother kept me in leading-strings.
label: anger

text: When my father died.
label: sadness

text: When I worked at the life-saving sevice and saw the first exitus.
label: disgust

text: When I made a fool at an examination.
label: shame

text: When I had wrongly explained someone an important exemple for anexamination.
label: guilt

text: Before I went to the urologist's I was afraid for severalreasons: because it was for the first time, because the medicalcheck-up might be painful, because of the uncertainty and becausesomeone had informed me about it.
label: fear

text: My girl-friend did not understand me; I was angry with myselfbecause I had problems when we seperated - I could not resignmyself to it.
label: anger

text: A friend who was 22 years old died.
label: sadness

text: When I was in the army, we got a certain dish for dinner that Ido not like at all. We were not obliged to eat, but I was veryhungry.
label: disgust

text: I had to pay a fine because of speeding.
label: shame

text: A friend who was 22 years old, died of leukemia; I had not knownthat he was so ill and therefore had not cared.
label: guilt

text: I was afraid before I went to the doctor's.
label: fear

text: I had an accident with damage to the car body.
label: anger

text: My dog died of a cerebral tumor.
label: sadness

text: When I worked at the life-saving service I was disgusted by apatient whose outward appearance was distasteful.
label: disgust

text: When a classmate wanted to sit down, I pulled his chair away, sothat he was slightly injured.
label: guilt

text: When I heard that a good friend, who had been abroad for a longtime, would come and see me.
label: joy

text: When I had my first oral examination after a long time;especially one day before the examination when I had the feelingthat I had not studied enough and had not enough time to make upfor it.
label: fear

text: I heard friends grumbling at me in an adjoining room, althoughthey had behaved in a friendly way when I was present.
label: anger

text: When my brother died.
label: sadness

text: I read about a murderer who brutalized his victims by cuttingopen their stomaches and taking out their bowels.
label: disgust

text: When I was a child: I had told my mother a lie and she found itout.
label: shame

text: My father had been alone for a long time because my mother andsister were on holiday. I had not seen him for a long time andwhen I finally called him I realized that he had been very sadabout that.
label: guilt

text: I unexpectedly got a present from my father.
label: joy

text: When I had to go through lonely streets in the middle of thenight.
label: fear

text: My boy-friend had promised me to come home at about 10 p.m. Hedid not return until midnight and had consumed a lot of alcohol.
label: anger

text: When I was walking on the street, I slipped on the dung of a dog.I did not fall down, but I felt disgusted by the bad smell on mysole.
label: disgust

text: Some persons, who are important for me, came to see me and I hadnot washed the dishes.
label: shame

text: I was looking after my cousin's little daughter; she fell down,was slightly injured and cried vociferously.
label: guilt

text: I got lost in a foreign town. I did not know the language of thatcountry and it took me hours to meet my friends again.
label: fear

text: A friend had promised to get me a book which was very importantfor my work, but she forgot it.
label: anger

text: My dog, whom I had had for eleven years, died. I watched hissoporification.
label: sadness

text: A drunk man bumped into me and wanted to grip me. Fortunately Iwas able to break loose.
label: disgust

text: When I stayed on a nudism beach, a man was watching me in adisagreeable way. I had the feeling that he was examining mybody.
label: shame

text: I had a quarrel with my father. He was depressed, becausesomebody had treated him injustly. As we had an argument, it wasimpossible for me to help him.
label: guilt

text: My uncle died - I felt sad at the funeral.
label: sadness

text: After an oral examination I shook the professor's hand, but hehad only stretched it out for my ball-point-pen.
label: shame

text: I spread abroad an intimate secret.
label: guilt

text: I bought a Christmas present for my girl-friend. On my way home Iwas really glad about having found such a suitable thing.
label: joy

text: My fear appeared in the form of jealousy. I was afraid that mygirl-friend had fallen in love with another man, I was afraid tolose her.
label: fear

text: I was angry when I watched a ski-race. All the Austrian skiersdropped out.
label: anger

text: During my holiday I met again a friend who had tried to commitsuicide. She had just left hospital, her lips were trembling, shelooked miserable.
label: sadness

text: On my way home in the middle of the night I saw a drunk man and awoman who were quarreling, beating each other, shouting and soon. I felt disgusted especially because they treated each otherin such a degrading way.
label: disgust

label: shame

label: guilt

text: I went to fetch my girl-friend at the station. When the trainarrived and I saw her descending and running up to me, I feltglad.
label: joy

label: fear

label: anger

text: It was only once that I really felt sad: at my grandfather'sfuneral (after a long time of suffering he had died of cancer).
label: sadness

The hostesses showsigns of concern and my first thought was that something was onthe runway in our path and that we were in danger of hitting it.
label: fear
